com.facebook.buck.cxx.toolchain

Class ClangWindowsCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.core.toolchain.tool.DelegatingTool
      • com.facebook.buck.cxx.toolchain.DefaultCompiler
        • com.facebook.buck.cxx.toolchain.ClangCompiler
          • com.facebook.buck.cxx.toolchain.ClangWindowsCompiler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AddsToRuleKey, Tool, Compiler

    public class ClangWindowsCompiler
extends ClangCompiler
    Compiler implementation for the Clang for Windows toolchain.

    This uses clang.exe directly, not simply clang-cl which is a CL-compatible front end for clang. This implementation exists basically only because of argfile differences. --rsp-quoting=windows should be added to use argfile on Windows.
